text: Wang Hao (, born 28 November 1966) is a male Chinese former international table tennis player. He won a gold medal at the 1987 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's team, a bronze medal at the 1987 World Table Tennis Championships in the mixed doubles with Guan Jianhua and a silver medal at the 1993 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's team. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Chinese male table tennis players Category:Table tennis players from Baoding Category:Living people Category:1966 births Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Wang Hao (table tennis, born 1966)
